"Enjoy yourself!" .... fucking hell. You know the thing about this is that, much like in any other "one male, many females" franchises (e.g: to love ru, infinite stratos, evangelion, school days, persona, pokemon, kantai collection, gran fantasia, etc) people get tired of these "autistic author projects its desires & delusions through a products which fictional world serves as a playground to their whims & desires spawned from the daydreams they had back in their high school years" where everything always works out just peachy for them, ever had that one kid in class who constantly tells lies based of his delusions of grandeur? It just gets tiresome, some people make these NTR works where the mc doesn't have that "author's avatar plot armor" and is subject to "reality". Some are like spongebob and are still capable of vicariously enjoying the author's crap, many are like squidward, cynical & jaded who are amused at seeing the author down while his waifu gets passed around like a joint.
